name: cerb.compose.validation.to
description: Warns if sending a compose draft without any recipients
script:
inputs:
  record/draft:
    record_type: draft
    required@bool: yes
    default: {{caller_params.draft_id}}

start:
  outcome/notEmptyTo:
    if@bool: {{inputs.draft.params.to}}
    then:
      return:
  
  await:
    form:
      title: Before you send that...
      elements:
        say:
          content@text:
            # You haven't specified any recipients
            A new ticket will be created without sending any email. This is normal if you're working on an issue and you plan to add an email address later (e.g. phone call).
            
        submit/prompt_next:
          buttons:
            continue/yes:
              label: Send without recipients
              icon: send
              icon_at: start
            continue/no:
              label: Whoops! I'll fix it
              style: secondary
              value: nope
  
  outcome/reject:
    if@bool: {{'nope' == prompt_next}}
    then:
      return:
        reject@bool: yes
